Package com.google.zxing

Class RGBLuminanceSource

java.lang.Object
com.google.zxing.LuminanceSource
com.google.zxing.GrayscaleLuminanceSource
com.google.zxing.RGBLuminanceSource
public final class RGBLuminanceSource extends GrayscaleLuminanceSource
This class is used to help decode images from files which arrive as RGB data from an ARGB pixel array.
Author:
dswitkin@google.com (Daniel Switkin), Betaminos
